mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CLUB ORDER BY CLUB_CODE DESC
SELECT b.ctmid_name FROM CATEGORYHIGH a, CATEGORYMIDDLE b where a.cthigh_name = #{cthigh_name} AND a.cthigh_code = b.cthigh_code
